Name: Niadra
Description: Niadra, the Broodmother, commands her swarm with unwavering will. She absorbs the psionic energy of the Protoss and harnesses their remnants of technology, evolving relentlessly towards the ultimate goal encoded in her genes.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Instantly fire 3 Acid Spines to the front cone. Bounces up to 4 targets, dealing 50 damage. Increase Niadra's weapon damage by 100% and movement speed by 20% in 8 seconds.
Root.Name: Spear Edge

Root.Tooltip: Niadra can increase the spawning speed of Zerg units in the area.
Root.Name: Breeding

Root.Tooltip: Niadra's basic attack will reduce 0.75 second cooldown for her abilities and top bar abilities. Niadra will deal 50% additional damage to parasitized enemy units and restore life at 25% damage.
Root.Name: Head of Medusa

Root.Tooltip: Niadra will unleash a Frenzy per attack, increasing 10% attack and movement speed for nearby units in 3 seconds. Stack up to 3 times.
Root.Name: Invasion Host

Root.Tooltip: Consume a certain biomass to grow into a much more powerful stage. Also unlocks more combat units and upgrades, and increases the maximum supply to 125.
Root.Name: Grow

Root.Tooltip:
"Curiously, this Chrono Boost device is much smaller than others. Why don't they use it to boost troops?"

The unit operates 15% faster. Can use it to initiate a chrono boost, additionally operating 45% faster in 5 seconds.
Root.Name: Chrono Boost

Root.Tooltip:
"I thought that the Protoss would stop eliminating if I hid in a steam valve. Then my Queen showed me in action that eliminating them all can we get peace."

Permanently Cloaked. Use it to become super cloaked and immune to damage in 5 seconds.
Root.Name: Cloaking Field

Root.Tooltip: Friendly zerg units in target area temporarily gain +200 shields, +50% attack speed (+25% for heroic units) and +50% movement speed. Lasts for 8 seconds.
Root.Name: Psionic Mutation

Root.Tooltip:
Quickly selects all Parasitic Larvas within 15 tiles of Niadra.

Parasitic Larvas are born from Top Panel: Parasite Host, can morph into Zerg combat units, and can also parasitize enemy units.
Root.Name: Regroup Larva
